attributes.action: support the Farmers in India that are fighting for their rights
attributes.additional_details:
this will show that you are still interested in world affairs and that you see the laws that have been passed in India on this matter are not correct and that support should be shown for these poor people. 
following in the example or Canada, USA, Germany and many other countries around the world.
attributes.background: show your support for the farmers that are currently sitting in New Delhi asking for there rights and for laws that where passed without debate while the country was in lockdown

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or House of Commons is responsible for. Decisions about about farming policy in India is a matter for the Indian Government, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
